title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: It’s been a while since this last happened, but we’ve got a double-winning comment this week, taking the first place spot on both the funny and insightful leaderboards. And it’s an anonymous comment too, responding to Elon Musk’s plans to add ID-based verification to Twitter: I have complete confidence that the man notorious for not […]
